name: Execute The Gunminal
description:
The Gunminal

Enter the Gunminal, a procedurally generated  turn based game where you'll have to explore endless dungeons and  shoot through waves of enemies. 

Controls

The controls are simple, use WASD to move ad  use the arrow keys to shoot bullets. Your goal is to kill all enemies in a room in order to progress to the next.

Start ScreenDungeon Generation

 Dungeons are made of small 8 x 8 pre-made rooms arranged in random patterns. 

Each dungeon contains at least one enemy and  will get progressively harder and bigger as you beat them. 

Level one always contains three rooms and at least one enemy

Levels will get more expansive as you progress through the gameEnemies will become tougher too
